legendaryGroup.name: Quotien
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the quotien takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects; the quotien can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: 在120英尺范围内能看到的机器都会伸出钢丝卷轴。任何在这种机器20英尺范围内的生物都必须在一个{@dc 15}力量救赎上取得成功，否则就会被拉到20英尺外的机器和{@condition grappled}(逃脱{@dc 20})。

一团由微小的照明机器组成的云充满了一个半径为20英尺的球体，该球体的中心是一个由quotien选择的120英尺内的点。这片云会在角落里扩散，并一直保持到quotien将其作为一个行动来解散，再次使用这个巢穴行动，或者死亡。云会被轻度遮蔽。当它出现时，任何在云中的生物都必须做一个{@dc 15}宪法救赎，如果救赎失败，将受到10({@dice 3d6})的穿刺伤害，如果救赎成功，将受到一半的伤害。在云中结束其回合的生物会受到10({@dice 3d6})的穿刺伤害。
quotien掷出一个{@dice d10}，并在掷出5-10时为禁卫墙充能。在1-4时，什么都不会发生。

legendaryGroup.name: Ravage Bear
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), a ravage bear can take a lair action to cause one of the following effects; the ravage bear can't use an effect again until it finishes a short or long rest:

items: 蹂躏熊撞倒了一台巨大的机器（或者打开它，造成可怕的光和声的展示，或者甚至可能是一个时间效应）；巢穴中的每一个生物都必须重新进行主动性排序。蹂躏熊可以选择不重新投票。
蹂躏熊使地板坍塌，导致它自己和30英尺范围内最多五个其他生物掉入它巢穴的另一个（更深的）部分，或者它之前找到的一个危险区域。蹂躏熊可以选择不掉下去。

item.name: Adhesion Gloves
entries: 这些合成物手套上覆盖着成千上万的略带粘性的黑点。激活后，在接下来的30分钟内，戴上它，你可以向上、向下、在垂直表面上移动，并沿着天花板上下颠倒，同时让你的双手自由。你还会获得与你的步行速度相等的攀爬速度。

item.name: Aggression Eye
entries: 这种人造眼睛是由玻璃、金属或水晶制成的。你必须把它按进你的空眼窝，并在那里保持至少一分钟，同时将丝线插入你的大脑。一旦眼睛安装妥当，你就可以通过它看东西，就像它是一只正常的眼睛一样。这只眼睛会自动扫描10英尺内的每个生物，并根据生物的弱点和伤势给你提供目标建议，使你在对它们的攻击卷中获得优势。因为这只眼睛不断地给你提供关于潜在威胁和攻击它所看到的每个人的方法的信息，所以你在劝说卷和其他愉快的社会交往中处于不利地位。你可以在行动中移除这只眼睛，但这样做是很痛苦的，而且会造成创伤，使你在接下来的一小时内的所有投掷中处于不利地位。
侵略性的眼睛有1/1D6的损耗，每个月检查。

item.name: Alertness Stimulant
entries: 这种无法辨认的图案可以像纹身一样贴在你的皮肤上，然后再去除。当坚定地敲击激活时，它能使你在三天内保持清醒和警惕，否定你对睡眠的需求。你仍然可以选择在受此赛博影响时睡觉。你在抵抗被迫睡眠或失去意识（比如精神攻击或药物，但不包括跌至0HP）的所有卷轴上获得优势。在密语效果结束后，你会变得精疲力竭--你每不睡一个晚上就会有一级精疲力竭。在赛博结束后，每睡一整晚都会使你的疲惫程度降低一个等级。

item.name: Amulet Of Numenera Safety
entries: 这个普通的金属盘挂在一条金属链上。当护身符被触及到一个numenera武器（如赛尔号、遗迹或铁肉）并作为一个动作被激活时，该武器就会与护身符同步，并且不能被激活来伤害护身符的佩戴者。例如，如果你戴着护身符，同步射线发射器就不会向你发射，如果你会受到影响，同步引爆赛弗就不会爆炸，等等。护身符一次只能与一件武器同步，而且只能与稀有度等于或小于护身符本身的武器同步。

item.name: Analyzing Shield
entries: 这种盾牌是由一种像金属一样坚硬的透明材料制成。你可以看穿它，它有一个显示屏，可以自动分析你通过它看到的目标，并指出你攻击他们的最佳位置。你可以使用你的反应，在对你能通过盾牌看到的目标进行近战攻击时，加上你的智力加成。

item.name: Antivenom Pill
entries: 这颗橙色药丸可以中和目前困扰你的一种毒药（如果你体内有多种毒药，则随机决定）。在接下来的五个小时里，你在对中毒的救赎中获得优势，并对毒药伤害产生抵抗。

item.name: Arm Bifurcator
entries: 这种胶状药丸有一个坚硬的外表面，内部是蓝色液体。当你吞下药丸时，你的前臂从肘部到手部纵向分裂，这样你的两个肢体就变成了四个。分裂的肢体是完整的（包括拇指），功能与你原来的肢体一样，尽管你用分裂的肢体行动有缺点，直到你花几分钟时间练习它们。这双手可以握住物体，挥舞武器，拿着盾牌，等等。你不会因此而获得额外的行动（尽管GM可能会允许你在一个回合中做一些不是行动的额外事情，比如写字、发手势、拿东西等等）。密语持续四个小时，之后你额外的前臂和手就会变成灰尘。

item.name: Armored Flesh
entries: 这似乎是一个有机装甲板的集合体，就像一个外壳或非常大的鱼鳞。与此物品相配的人将它永久地移植到你身上，用鳞片覆盖你的全身，保护你（AC17），但不会以任何方式阻碍你的行动，即使在试图隐身的时候。
遗物能增强你的肌肉；当你佩戴它时，你的力量值为15。如果你的力量在没有它们的情况下是15或更高，这对你没有影响。然而，这些好处是有代价的。纤维状的卷须延伸到你的肉里，并在接下来的一周内最终到达你的脊椎和大脑，永久性地使你的智力降低2分（最低分是1分）。
主动结束调和会导致你的身体拒绝电镀，破坏遗物。这将结束增强的力量，但不会结束降低的智力。

item.name: Astute Weapon Nodule
entries: 这个由水晶和合成物组成的装置必须附着在武器上才能发挥作用；应用这个结点需要一个行动。受影响的武器在第二天会变成一个有生命的物品，具有与你相似的个性和面貌。它能说、能读、能理解一种与你相同的语言，在60英尺范围内有听觉和正常的视觉，并有与你相同或在你一步之内的排列。它的智力、智慧和魅力为12（+0）。它可以以5英尺的速度飞行。它可以在战斗中帮助你，将自己移动到对手的要害处，使你在挥舞它的时候在攻击卷上获得优势。

item.name: Attractor
entries: 当你激活这个类似武器的装置，并将它指向100英尺内的一个中等大小的非固定物品时，该物品会被拉到你身边，并在你下一回合开始前到达。该物品到达时没有动力。

item.name: Augmentation Heptagon
entries: 这个金属盒子有七个面，里面有一对把手，大到可以让你同时把两只手放进去。作为你的行动，你可以同时抓住两个把手，这使遗物为你注射一种强效血清。在接下来的三天里，你的一项技能或任务的能力得到了增强。每当你为该技能或任务做卷轴时，都要加上你的熟练度奖励。如果你通常会在该技能或任务中加入你的熟练度加成，你则会加入双倍的熟练度加成。每个增强的七边形都与一个不同的技能或任务有关，包括以下内容。

entries.caption: An augmentation heptagon has a depletion of 1 in 1d20.

item.name: Automated Bath
entries: 这个盘旋的球体由金属和一些坚硬的非金属部件组成；上面挂着带管子和清洁工具的金属臂。你可以用你的行动命令它在30英尺内清洁一个愿意的目标。球体移动到目标处，开始清洁所有的污垢，包括清洁牙齿、清洗和梳理头发，以及修剪指甲。如果目标是生物，球体也会清洁他们的衣服和设备。一个自动浴场的损耗为1/1D100。

item.name: Amber Casement
entries: 这个复杂的装置由一系列短小的圆形管子和软管组成，长约1英尺。当作为一个动作被激活时，它将空气凝固在一个10英尺的立方体空间内，其中心必须在该装置的60英尺范围内。空气被转化为琥珀状物质，该区域内的每个生物都必须做一个灵巧的蓄力动作（DC20），否则就会被困在琥珀中。被困的生物可以进行一次DC30的力量（竞技）检查。如果成功，该生物就会挣脱出来，并摧毁其周围的凝固琥珀和任何其他被困的生物。否则，被困在里面的人很可能会窒息或饿死。
琥珀开窗有一个自动耗损；它只能使用一次。

item.name: Automated Cook
entries: 这个立方体由金属和其他物质组成，可以伸出和缩回金属手臂和工具。当给它水和有机化合物（甚至是通常人类无法食用的）时，它就会用它们准备一份热的、有营养的、美味的食物。食物的数量大约等于它所得到的材料的数量（大约需要1磅的材料来制作一个人的食物）。一个自动炊具的耗损率为1/1D100，每天使用时检查。当它耗尽时，有同等的机会完全停止运作，在停止运作之前喷出难吃的淤泥，或者创造出最后一顿看似正常但实际上有毒的食物（任何吃了它的人必须在DC13宪法救赎中成功，否则会被毒害1d6小时）。

item.name: Automaton Seed
entries: 这个赛尔号是一个长方形的金属种子或菱形的形式，大约1英寸长。当放在土壤中时，它吸收矿物质并制造出一个（%0%），1d6分钟后从地下冒出来。自动机在10小时内保持活跃，跟随你或去你指示的地方（这不是一个动作）。不同的种子会生长出不同种类的自动机，包括自动机种子表上介绍的那些。

entries.caption: Automaton Seed Table
rows: 为您创造和准备一份高质量的膳食
讲述关于你的令人印象深刻的故事，并在任何任务上给予你优势，给别人留下深刻印象。
执行相当于一天的工艺或协助木工项目的工作
将你的熟练度加到命中率卷上，以恢复命中率。
使你在智力技能检查中获得优势
为你创造一套高质量的服装
为你携带一个赛尔号（这并不计入你的赛尔号上限）。
执行相当于一天的工艺或协助砌筑物品的工作
监视并报告它所看到的情况，对隐身术有熟练度和优势
挑战等级为1/4的生物的机器复制品

item.name: Banishing Nodule
entries: 这个水晶结点必须贴在近战武器上才能发挥作用；应用这个结点需要一个动作。受影响的武器随后获得以下额外能力，持续1天。每当带结晶体的武器击中一个坚固的生物或物体时，它会产生一股能量，将被击中的生物或物体向一个随机的方向（不是向上或向下）传送10英尺。被传送的生物在下一回合的所有行动以及蓄力攻击中都处于劣势。

item.name: Battle Armor
entries: 这套完整的盔甲是由钢和一种坚硬的未知物质制成。它类似于板甲，但比任何已知的铁匠所能制造的都要轻得多，其非常精细的衔接点覆盖了整个身体，甚至在像脖子这样的复杂关节处。它能像板甲一样保护你（AC18），但有+2的奖励。盔甲是完全密封的（气密性和水密性），并且有自己永恒更新的内部气氛，允许你在任何环境下正常呼吸，并使你在面对有害的蒸汽和气体（如吸入的毒药和一些龙的呼吸武器）时有优势。该盔甲还能使你对寒冷和火焰伤害产生抵抗力。
遗迹不会耗尽，但GM可以裁定高额的伤害会破坏盔甲的密封环境；这将终止它的呼吸益处和对寒冷和火焰的抵抗，但仍然提供它的全部AC。

item.name: Battlesuit
entries: 这套完整的盔甲是由钢和一种坚硬的未知物质制成。它类似于板甲，但比任何已知的铁匠所能制造的都要轻得多，其非常精细的衔接点覆盖了整个身体，甚至在像脖子这样的复杂关节处。它能像板甲一样保护你（AC18），但有+2的奖励。盔甲是完全密封的（气密性和水密性），并且有自己永恒更新的内部气氛，允许你在任何环境下正常呼吸，并使你在面对有害的蒸汽和气体（如吸入的毒药和一些龙的呼吸武器）时有优势。该盔甲还能使你对寒冷和火焰伤害产生抵抗力。
遗物能增强你的肌肉；当你佩戴它时，你的力量值为17。如果你的力量在没有它们的情况下是17或更高，这对你没有影响。你在力量（竞技）检查和需要蛮力的检查（如举起重物，但不是攻击卷）上也有优势。
遗迹不会耗尽，但GM可以裁定高额的伤害会损害盔甲的功能；这将终止其呼吸益处、对寒冷和火焰的抵抗、力量奖励和力量优势，但仍然提供其全部的AC。

item.name: Beast Lure
entries: 这个笨重的装置有一个尖尖的 "脚"，可以刺入地面。激活后，它向大约3英里的范围内发出召唤，引诱一只挑战等级不高于3的野兽（如蹂躏熊或Seskii）。野兽以其正常的速度赶到赛弗的位置，并平静地停留在那里长达1小时。在这段时间里，你可以向野兽传授一个基本的概念或问题，而野兽可以传达一个简单的答案作为回报。如果野兽受到攻击，平静的效果立即结束。平静一小时后，野兽会回到之前的领地（尽管它可能会被猎物挡住去路或在途中受到攻击）。

item.name: Blinking Nodule
entries: 这个水晶结点必须贴在你的盔甲（或一件衣服）上才能发挥作用；应用这个结点需要一个动作。在接下来的一天里，每当你被重击而受到伤害时，你就会向一个随机的方向（不是向上或向下）传送大约10英尺。因为你正在期待这个传送，而你的对手却没有，所以你的敌人在下一次对你的攻击中处于劣势。

item.name: Body Duplicator
entries: 这块润喉糖被涂在一种蜡质材料上，上面刻有无法识别的文字。当你激活它时（通过触摸你的舌头、脸颊内侧或几滴你的血液），它开始合成一个你身体的复制品。这个复制品不是活的--它只是惰性组织--但以你的肉体为基础，所以你的任何修饰（如铁肉、疤痕、纹身等等）都不会出现在复制品上。因为它是与你相同的肉体，它的组织可以移植到你的身上或与你交换（如器官移植）而没有免疫反应。复制品的生长需要大约一个小时。它以死尸的正常速度衰亡。你的灵魂与这个身体没有自动的联系，所以如果你死了，你的灵魂不会自动转移到复制品上（尽管如果你原来的身体被毁，你需要一个身体让你的灵魂居住，复制品是完全兼容的）。

item.name: Bounding Boots
entries: 这种装置是两套灵活的带子，上面镶有金属和晶体物品。当连接到一双鞋类（如靴子或鞋子）上时，它们会减少重力对你的拉扯。你的行走速度变为30英尺（除非它已经更高）。身负重物或穿着重甲不会降低你的行走速度。你可以跳出正常距离的三倍，尽管这并不允许你跳得比你剩余的动作所允许的更远。
捆绑靴的消耗量为1/10，在靴子使用的每一天结束时检查一次。

item.name: Brain Bud
entries: 这个有机豆荚，几乎就像一个小的半球形水果，必须贴在一个生物身上才能发挥作用；应用这个芽需要一个动作。一旦应用，它就会永久地移植到你身上，具有你的肉体的颜色和纹理。
此后，每天一次，你可以在任何由智力修改的技能检查（如历史或调查）中获得优势。
一个脑芽有一个自动耗损；它只能使用一次。

item.name: Brain Fogger
entries: 这种背包大小的装置戴在背上，有一个金属棒，用软管和电线连接。当你的行动被激活时，这根魔杖会发出一股巨大的雾气，随着盛行的空气移动，填满一个直径约500英尺、深度约20英尺的区域。除了使该区域变得轻度模糊外，雾还会影响生物的思想。只要他们还在云层中，他们的智力检查和救赎就处于劣势。对毒气免疫的生物通常不会受到雾气的精神干扰的影响。雾气持续约一小时，但可以被适度的风驱散。
一个大脑迷糊的人有1/10的消耗。

item.name: Bread Sprayer
entries: 这种罐子由金属或类似的硬质材料制成，有一个长的柔性管子从一端伸出。它有两种操作模式。在默认模式下，你可以用你的行动来分配一个手掌宽的棕色面团状材料的圆柱体，每一轮最多可以有10英尺长，大约一分钟后，它自己会被煮成一种平淡的硬壳面包。通过堆积多层，你可以创造更大的结构，如墙壁和门洞，但它仍然只是硬面包。这种面包可以填饱肚子，也很有营养，但不是人类可以长期生活的东西。
在爆裂模式下，当你的行动被激活时，管子会在一个10英尺的圆锥体中喷出高容量的面团浆液，瞬间将自己烤成硬面包。锥体内的所有生物都会受到1d4的火焰伤害，并且必须在DC 13的灵巧救赎中成功，否则该生物
只要它还在熟面包中，就会被限制住，直到它挣脱。被硬面包束缚住的生物可以用它的行动来做一个DC13力量检查。如果它成功了，它就不再被束缚。与{@item detonation of webs|aota}赛弗不同，这个遗迹所创造的材料是永久性的，但是（与普通面包一样）它可能会被动物吃掉，被水或其他液体软化，等等。
面包喷雾器的消耗量为1D20，在默认模式下每使用一小时检查一次，在突发模式下每次使用检查一次。

item.name: Breathing Field Spinner
entries: 这个金属球上有几十个细小的孔洞，放在一个可折叠的金属三脚架上面。组装和设置这个装置需要两个回合。当作为你的行动被激活时，在接下来的一个小时里，地球仪开始旋转，以连续的风向向各个方向送出新鲜、可呼吸的空气。在平静的空气中，这股风会延伸到120英尺以外，但洋流、天气和气压会把它缩小到更小的范围。该区域内的生物可以正常呼吸，即使周围的空气是有害的。可呼吸空气的球体可以排斥或改变雾气、雾气、毒气云以及其他通常随风飘散的影响。球体中的生物在对抗气体效应时获得优势，例如绿色龙息。
一个呼吸场旋转器的消耗量为1/1D20。

item.name: Bridge Builder
entries: 这种笨重的手持式设备看起来像两块几乎相同的碎片融合在一起。当被激活时，两块碎片分离；你必须将第二块碎片放在500英尺以外的任何地方，然后激活任何一块碎片。随着第二次激活，一波纳米机器人从其中一个碎片中扫出，每轮移动约60英尺，留下一条宽10英尺、厚1英尺的灰色固体材料。最终，这个波浪和它后面的条带连接到另一个赛博片的端点，创造了
它们之间有一个稳定的类似道路的表面。这条带子绕过物体、地形特征和结构，但它在峡谷和景观中小于300英尺宽的其他空隙上架起了桥梁。这条带子成为景观的一个永久固定物。

item.name: Burrowing Boots
entries: 这些超大的靴子通过电线与皮带上的金属盒相连。当作为你的行动被激活时，你可以钻过地面或回到地面，就像你有一个20英尺的钻探速度一样。利用腰带装置上的复杂控制，你可以留下一条狭窄、光滑的隧道，或者根本不留下任何隧道，因为材料在你身后又合拢了。这双靴子没有给你在空旷的空气中移动的能力，所以如果你闯入一个口袋或其他开放空间，你可能会掉下去。默认情况下，你可以直接向上或向下移动，但你可以使用控制装置来调整你的钻洞路径，最多与垂直方向成15度。靴子可以钻过沙子、泥巴、碎石或硬土，但不能钻过坚硬的岩石。
掘进靴的消耗量为1/1D20，每使用一小时检查一次。

item.name: Calm Center
entries: 这种光滑的药丸呈舒缓的颜色，有一种吸引人的香味。当你吞下它时，你会变得完全平静，散发出和平和保证。仅仅是在你身边，就能让人放松和振奋。在以你为中心的60英尺半径范围内的所有生物，在接下来的一分钟内，在他们选择的一个卷轴上获得优势。一分钟后，该效果结束（并且任何未使用的来自赛弗的优势都会消失）。

item.name: Carryall
entries: 这种装置由一个金属盒子或箱子组成，两边有履带式轮子。贴在盒子一端的金属徽章可以取下，戴在腰带上。盒子以30英尺的速度跟随徽章，总是试图保持在徽章的10英尺之内。徽章上的一个按钮允许你命令盒子留在原地或来到你的位置（只要它在你当前位置的约10英里范围内）。盒子大部分是空心的，可以容纳5000磅的重量。
一个手提箱的耗损率为1/1D20，每天使用时检查。当它耗尽时，有50%的几率不是完全停止运作，而是减少一半的承载能力。

item.name: Catholicon
entries: 这种旋转的液体可以中和目前困扰你的一种疾病（如果你有多种疾病，则随机决定）。在接下来的五个小时里，你在对疾病的救赎中获得优势，并对疾病的伤害（包括减少你最大命中率的疾病效果）产生抵抗。

item.name: Catseye
entries: 这种注射液的银色液体使你具有在黑暗中看东西的能力，使你在第二天获得暗视觉。

item.name: Cellular Annealer
entries: 这个小型手持设备有几个简单的控制。当作为你的行动激活时，它会产生一束微弱的能量，刺激活体或有机体目标的愈合。目标会恢复1d8+5点生命值。如果他们失去了意识，他们会变得有意识。如果他们丧失了能力，他们就不再丧失能力了。
细胞退火器的耗损率为1/1D10。

item.name: Chameleon Cloak
entries: 这种薄而轻的透明布被粗略地切割成斗篷的形状。激活后，它在接下来的10分钟内会呈现出你周围事物的颜色和质地，掩盖你的形状。你在为隐藏而进行的灵巧（隐身）检查中具有优势。其他主动或偶然试图注意到你的生物在智慧（感知）检查中处于劣势，无法看到你。
变色龙斗篷的耗损率为1/100。

item.name: Chemical Factory
entries: 这种大药丸利用你的生物系统作为工厂，制造出有用的液体，你在接下来的一个小时内出汗，总共制造出1d6个剂量，一周后失去效力。剂量不计入赛博。在下面的表格中滚动，看看汗液有什么效果。

rows: 欣快感持续{@dice 1d6}小时(对所有卷轴不利)
产生幻觉{@dice 1d6}小时(对所有卷轴不利)
刺激剂，持续{@dice 1d6}小时(对所有卷轴有利，随后在同等时间内对所有卷轴不利)
抑制剂，持续时间为{@dice 1d6}小时(在所有卷中处于劣势)
营养素补充（算作一餐健康餐）
治疗影响饮用者的一种疾病
在一小时内对所有的力量卷有优势
在一小时内对所有的灵巧卷有优势
在一小时内对所有智力测验有优势

item.name: City Shroud
entries: 当激活时，这个看起来很复杂的密码器会分裂成两块。如果任何一块被移到离另一块最远1英里的地方并被激活，它们之间的区域就会变成一个视觉扭曲的球体的最外层直径。它将任何人工结构隐藏在其中，不让任何人从该区域外观看该地点（包括道路，它们与该区域融为一体，仿佛它们被忽视和侵蚀得毫无用处）。这种效果持续一天。外面的观众只看到受影响地区周围自然景观的延续。该赛博可以用来隐藏一个小社区、废墟或其他一些地点，假设它适合在一个不超过1英里宽的区域内。因为扭曲并不能隐藏声音、气味、味道或触觉，所以该地区的任何人都必须小心翼翼地避免暴露自己的存在；赛博最适合用来欺骗接近的军队，使其认为该地区没有一个定居点。

item.name: Clawed Extremity
entries: 这个装置类似于一个空心的三指手，大约是人的手的两倍大小。当戴在你的手上或脚上并作为你的行动激活时，它就会附着在你身上，除非你花行动力来解除它，否则就不能被移除。作为你的行动，你可以从这个肢体的指头上伸出或缩回硬爪，使你可以把它作为一种自然砍伐武器，造成1d8点伤害。然而，这些爪子使你很难用这个肢体来完成其他任务。如果你把它戴在手上，你在用那只手握住或操纵物体的过程中获得劣势。如果你把它戴在脚上，你在行走、奔跑、攀爬或保持平衡的过程中会获得劣势。
爪状肢体的消耗量为1/1D20，每使用一周检查一次。

item.name: Clean Bright
entries: 这个手持式投影仪类似于一个连接在金属杆上的香炉。当你在一个巨大的结构旁边或内部激活它时，在接下来的一个小时里，擦洗纳米机器人在结构中移动，清洁和整理它，就像受到一个可靠的清洁服务的专业关注。

item.name: Cloak Of Finery
entries: 这件多层斗篷由闪亮的材料制成，并镶有微型装置。当你穿上它时，它会自动调整以适合你。当作为你的行动被激活时，在接下来的一分钟里，斗篷会通过改变颜色、创造温和的光芒、放大你的声音、调节你的语调，以及（以有限的方式）编辑你所说的话来纠正语法错误、说错的话和尴尬的停顿，使你更加令人印象深刻。当你以这种方式活动时，你在欺骗、恐吓、表演和劝说技能检查中获得优势并增加你的熟练度奖励。
一件精美的斗篷在1D20中的损耗为1。

item.name: Cohesion Stabilizer
entries: 这个安装在手腕上的装置上面有一些简单的控制。它可以瞬间创造一个微妙的无形的能量场，保护你物理形态的形状和维度位置。作为一种反应，你可以激活这个装置来抵抗任何试图使你变形、分解你、破坏你的肉体（比如用一个{@item flesh disruptor|aota}的遗物或一个{@item detonation of flesh-rotting|aota}。如果这个转化的源头的DC是15或更低，它就自动失败。如果来源的DC是16或更高，你在对它的自救中获得优势，并对该效果造成的任何伤害获得抵抗。
凝聚力稳定剂的耗损率为1/10，每次使用时都要检查。当它耗尽时，有可能会出现意外的裂痕。

item.name: Comprehension Graft
entries: 当应用于你的头部时，这个光盘立即释放出微丝，进入你的大脑。五分钟内，你就能听懂以移植为关键的一种特定语言的文字。如果你已经能够理解这种语言，那么这个加密器就没有任何效果。一旦嫁接物附着，效果是永久性的，而且这个装置不再计入你能承受的赛尔号数量。
你可以对另一个生物而不是你自己使用这个密文。即使你把它用在一个通常没有语言的生物身上，例如狼，它也能发挥作用。

item.name: Controlled Blinking Nodule
entries: 这个水晶结点必须贴在你的盔甲（或一件衣服）上才能发挥作用；应用这个结点需要一个动作。在接下来的一天里，每当你被重击而受到伤害时，你会向一个随机的方向（不是向上或向下）传送约10英尺远。因为你正在期待这个传送，而你的对手却没有，所以你的敌人在下一次对你的攻击中会处于劣势。

item.name: Corpse Likeness
entries: 这个赛博是一个金属球体，表面有几个玻璃镜片。第一次激活它时，你要把它接触到一具不超过几天的尸体。一分钟后， cypher开始发红光，表明它已经记录了尸体的外观。当你再次激活这个球体时，你的外表会发生变化，以符合

尸体的，包括它的衣服、盔甲、武器和其他物品。这不是身体上的转化--如果尸体戴着帽子而你没有，物体会穿过帽子，任何接触到它的人都不会有任何感觉，或者会感觉到你的头和头发。在休闲场合，你可以冒充被记录者的活人（假设他们没有任何明显的致命伤）。你也可以伪装成被记录者的尸体（如果你保持不动），或者可能是他们的僵尸（如果你不动）。为了辨别你的伪装，一个生物可以用它的行动来检查你的外表，并且必须在智力（调查）检查中取得成功，检查标准为DC13（如果你假装成一具尸体而不是一个活人，则有劣势）。伪装会持续一个小时。

item.name: Crafter's Eyes
entries: 这些厚厚的镜片连接到一个金属框架上，像眼镜一样戴在你的眼睛上。当被激活时，它们会引导你的工艺工作，使你在一整天内更有效率，使你在一天内就能完成价值100戈比的工艺进展。你仍然需要你通常所需要的一切（材料、适当的工具、对这些工具的熟练程度，以及对如何制作你试图创造的东西的基本想法）。

item.name: Cypher Bag
entries: 这个袋子是由一种灵活的未知物质制成的，与木材一样耐用。它最多可以容纳三个赛尔号，只要每个赛尔号不大于一个典型的手持设备。袋子里的任何赛博都不计入你的赛博限额。
一个赛博袋的消耗量为1D20，每次你把赛博放进袋子时都要检查。

item.name: Cypher Stabilizing Suit
entries: 这件灵活的服装上布满了端口和插头。你可以使用它的内置端口将最多四个不常见的赛博连接到衣服上。如果你穿着这套衣服并激活了与之相连的赛尔号，作为一个额外的动作，你可以保留赛尔号（所以它没有被用完），而让这套衣服做一个耗尽卷。(有些赛博（尤其是药丸和注射剂）不能以这种方式连接到战衣上。
细胞稳定服的耗损率为1/6。

item.name: Death Protector
entries: 这种束带装置可以贴着你的皮肤或穿在衣服上，但不能穿在盔甲上。如果你死了，背带会自动激活并给你注射纳米机器人，以维持和激活你的细胞。在接下来的一分钟里，你的身体会在它的回合中移动（使用冲刺动作），总是以最安全的路线使你远离危险。在这一分钟结束后，你会掷出一个命中率骰子来恢复命中率（即使你已经用完了当天所有的命中率骰子），这使你恢复了生命。起死回生是一种折磨。你对所有的攻击卷、蓄力攻击和能力检查都会受到-4的惩罚。每当你完成一次长期休息，这个惩罚就会减少1，直到它消失。

item.name: Deception Filter
entries: 这个小装置看起来就像一个你贴在帽子或衬衫上的徽章。当你激活它时，在接下来的一个小时里，你不能说故意的谎言。你意识到你被阻止故意说谎话，如果被问及，你不会被强迫说话。只要你保持在真相的范围内，你可以对你的答案进行回避。

item.name: Density Nodule
entries: 这个水晶结点必须贴在近战武器上才能发挥作用；应用这个结点需要一个动作。受影响的武器会获得以下额外能力，持续1天。每次带结晶体的武器击中固体生物或物体时，它的重量会突然剧增，造成额外的1d4伤害（该伤害与武器通常造成的类型相同）。

item.name: Detextilizer
entries: 这个手持设备有多个棱形的延伸。当作为你的行动被激活时，它发射出一道微弱的光束，击中120英尺内的一个目标。如果DC13宪法救赎失败，目标的普通衣服就会在一阵灰尘中消散。该装置不影响魔法物品、Numenera、石头或金属，只影响典型的有机衣物材料，如亚麻、皮革、丝绸和羊毛。
一个去污器的耗损率为1/1D20。

item.name: Detonating Scuttler (Acid)
entries: 这个手掌大小的装置有一打金属腿，类似于昆虫。当作为你的行动被激活时，它遵循你提供的简单运动指令，在离你最多500英尺的地方移动，然后引爆。指示可以包括以特定的模式移动，追逐一个你能看到并指出的指定目标，或者跟踪一个发出特定声音的生物或物体。如果你提供了更复杂的指令，需要 "破坏者 "做出一些判断（如等待一段时间，询问潜在的目标并等待一个不可接受的答案，等等），你必须做一个智力检查（难度由GM决定）。如果你成功了，scuttler就会按照你的意图执行，否则当该条件发生时，它就会爆炸。铲除者的行走速度为30英尺。当它爆炸时，半径10英尺范围内的所有生物都必须做一个DC 15的灵巧救赎动作。蓄力失败时，目标会受到2d6+2的酸液伤害，蓄力成功则会受到一半的伤害。伤害的类型是以下之一

item.name: Detonation (cell Disruption)
entries: 这个小装置由合成物和奇怪的金属制成。你可以在同一个攻击动作中激活它并投掷它（范围20/60）。当它击中一个生物或固体物体（如地面）时就会爆炸。所有在10英尺半径范围内的生物必须做一个DC13的灵巧反射。蓄力失败时，目标会受到2d6+2的坏死伤害，蓄力成功时则是一半的伤害。

item.name: Detonation Of The Black Sphere
entries: 这个手持装置是一簇沉重的金属棒，顶端像宝石一样。你可以激活它并将棒子指向一个区域（范围30/120），作为同一攻击动作的一部分。它在目标地点的宇宙中创造一个临时的洞（大约2英尺宽）。所有在25英尺半径范围内的生物（无论他们是否接触到这个洞）必须
做出DC17宪法规定的救赎动作。10英尺范围内所有没有安全保障的物体和生物都会被吸引到洞口，并且在他们的救赎动作中处于不利地位。目标会受到4d6+4的力量伤害，如果救赎失败会被眩晕一回合，如果救赎成功会受到一半的伤害但不会被眩晕。

item.name: Detonation Of Blindness
entries: 这个小装置是由合成物和几十个微小的玻璃状切面组成。你可以激活它，并将其作为同一攻击动作的一部分投掷出去（范围20/60）。当它击中一个生物或固体物体（如地面）时就会爆炸，并产生一道强烈的闪光。半径10英尺范围内的所有生物都必须进行DC13宪法规定的投掷。目标会失明一分钟，救赎失败会受到1d6辐射伤害，或者不会失明，救赎成功会受到一半伤害。

item.name: Detonation Of Deafening
entries: 这个手持装置是由黑色金属带围绕灰色合成球体制成的。你可以激活它，并在同一攻击动作中投掷它（范围20/60）。当它击中一个生物或固体物体（如地面）时，会爆发出可怕的声音。所有在10英尺半径范围内的生物都必须做一个DC13的宪法救赎动作。目标会被震聋30分钟，如果救赎失败会受到1d6的雷霆伤害，或者不会被震聋，救赎成功会受到一半伤害。

item.name: Detonation Of Decoy Sounds
entries: 这个小装置看起来是由多色的电线缠绕在一个中央核心上。你可以激活它，并在同一攻击动作中投掷它（范围20/60）。撞击后，它会播放一个响亮的预先录制的声音，持续三分钟。大多数这些赛博有两到三种预先录制的声音（如野兽的吼叫声、机器的磨擦声和爆炸声）。
咆哮的火），你选择哪一个来激活（这是激活它的行动的一部分）。其中一些 cyphers 也有录制新声音的能力。预先录制的声音和蹂躏熊的声音差不多，但用户录制的声音和用户录制的声音完全一样。

item.name: Detonation Of Desiccation
entries: 这个小装置由合成物和危险化学品制成。你可以在同一个攻击动作中激活它并投掷它（范围20/60）。当它击中生物或固体物体（如地面）时就会爆炸，并将该区域的水分抽干（该区域的明水消失）。所有在10英尺半径范围内的生物都必须做一个DC13的灵巧救赎动作。拯救失败时，目标会受到2d6+2的坏死伤害，拯救成功则会受到一半的伤害。一个主要由水组成的元素对这种伤害是很脆弱的。

item.name: Detonation Of Flesh-rotting
entries: 这个拳头大小的装置上有昏暗的闪烁的灯光，可以被扔到60英尺以外。当它到达弹道的终点时，装置会以低沉的轰鸣声引爆，变成破坏细胞的紫黑色能量的爆炸。以该点为中心的20英尺半径范围内的每个生物都必须做一个DC13的灵巧反射。拯救失败时，目标会受到8d6的坏死伤害，拯救成功时则会受到一半的伤害。
坏死的影响在角落里蔓延。它杀死了该地区的植物和其他自然生长。

item.name: Detonation Of Gravity
entries: 这个拳头大小的装置上有昏暗的闪烁的灯光，可以被扔到60英尺以外。当它到达其轨迹的终点时，该装置会以低沉的轰鸣声引爆，变成一个倒置的重力爆炸。以该点为中心的20英尺半径范围内的每个生物都必须做一个DC17的灵巧救赎，因为他们会被砸平在地上。如果救赎失败，目标将受到8d6的重击伤害，如果救赎成功，将受到一半的伤害。
颠倒的重力会在角落里扩散。该区域内的所有生物，无论他们的救赎是否成功，都会被压在地上一回合，不能采取物理行动。

item.name: Detonation, Greater (cell Disruption)
entries: 这个手持装置是一个金属管，有重量，一端封闭。作为你的攻击动作，你可以用这个装置向一个区域发射一个弹丸（范围30/120）。该弹丸在击中生物或固体物体（如地面）时爆炸。所有在25英尺半径范围内的生物都必须做一个DC 15的灵巧反射。蓄力失败时，目标会受到4d6+4的坏死伤害，蓄力成功时则受到一半的伤害。

item.name: Detonation Of Matter Disruption
entries: 这个小装置由合成物制成，包含数十亿个微小的纳米机械。你可以激活它，并将其作为同一攻击动作的一部分投掷出去（范围20/60）。当它击中一个生物或固体物体（如地面）时就会爆炸，释放出纳米机械，以随机的方式重新排列物质--固体融化并被重新组合，肉体变成玻璃，金属变成木头，等等。所有在10英尺半径范围内的生物都必须做一个DC15的宪法救赎。拯救失败时，目标会受到4d6+4的坏死伤害，拯救成功时则受到一半的伤害。

item.name: Detonation Of Peace
entries: 激活后，这个腕带投射器会产生一个精神爆裂。半径100英尺范围内的所有生物都必须在DC13智慧救赎中成功，否则就会对它们感到敌意的任何生物漠不关心，并结束它们正在进行或将要进行的任何暴力行动。如果目标被攻击或被效果所伤害，或者如果它目睹它的任何朋友被伤害，这种冷漠就会结束。一分钟后，效果结束，受影响的生物会再次产生敌意，除非GM另有规定。

item.name: Detonation Of Soap
entries: 这个小装置是由薄的合成物制成的，里面充满了密集的液体。你可以激活它，并在同一个攻击动作中投掷它（范围20/60）。当它击中生物或固体物体（如地面）时就会爆炸，在半径10英尺的范围内充满类似于肥皂泡的滑腻泡沫。该区域的视线被遮蔽，就像被浓雾遮蔽一样。每个站在该区域的生物都必须在DC13的灵巧救赎中成功，否则就会倒地。进入该区域的生物或在那里结束其回合的生物也必须成功进行灵巧救赎，否则就会倒下。生物在该区域内爬墙和其他直立的表面时有劣势。泡沫是不易燃的，并且会使火苗窒息。大约一小时后，泡沫会坍塌成粘稠的残留物，再过一小时就完全消失了。

item.name: Detonation Of Sobriety
entries: 这个小装置由红色和蓝色合成物制成。你可以在同一个攻击动作中激活它并投掷它（范围20/60）。它在10英尺半径的范围内产生一阵绿色能量，可以中和酒精和类似麻醉剂的影响，就像受影响的生物花了三个小时禁欲以清醒过来。

item.name: Detonation Of Spawning
entries: 这个笨重的、多节的球体由金属和合成物制成，有一个长的、类似手柄的杆。你可以激活它并将杆子指向一个区域（范围30/120），作为同一攻击动作的一部分。它在目标区域爆炸。半径10英尺范围内的目标必须做一个DC15的体质测试。目标会失明一分钟，救赎失败会受到2d6辐射伤害，或者不会失明，救赎成功会受到一半伤害。在下一回合，球体分离成1d6个额外的爆炸物，这些爆炸物飞到60英尺内的随机地点并爆炸。在这些二次爆炸的每个10英尺半径范围内的所有生物都必须做一个DC 15的灵巧救赎动作。拯救失败时，目标会受到4d6+4的伤害，拯救成功时则会受到一半的伤害。伤害的类型取决于它是哪种类型的引爆。

rows: {@item Detonation (cell Disruption)|aota|Cell Disruption} (坏死性伤害，只伤害肉体)

entries: 这些引爆物通常以其造成的伤害类型命名：引爆产卵细胞破坏，引爆产卵腐蚀，等等。

item.name: Detonation Of Telekinesis
entries: 这个小装置是由金属和高能粒子组成。你可以在同一个攻击动作中激活它并投掷它（范围20/60）。当它击中一个生物或固体物体（如地面）时就会爆炸。所有在10英尺半径范围内的生物必须做一个DC13宪法规定的投掷动作。蓄力失败时，目标会受到2d6+2的力量伤害，蓄力成功时则受到一半的伤害。该区域内重量小于20磅的物体会被推到该区域外。

item.name: Detonation Of Tracking
entries: 这个cypher是一个带有玻璃屏幕的腕带式投影仪。作为你的攻击动作，你可以用这个装置向一个区域发射一个弹丸（范围30/120）。当弹丸击中生物或固体物体（如地面）时，会产生一个弹片的爆炸。25英尺半径范围内的所有生物必须做一个DC 15的灵巧反射。蓄力失败时，目标会受到2d6+2的穿刺伤害，蓄力成功则受到一半的伤害。在接下来的一周里，你可以使用赛博上的屏幕来追踪爆炸中所有生物的方向和距离。

item.name: Detonation Of Webs
entries: 这个小装置由合成物和有机材料制成。你可以在同一个攻击动作中激活它并投掷它（范围20/60）。当它击中一个生物或固体物体（如地面）时就会爆炸，释放出粘稠的胶状物，持续1小时。半径10英尺范围内的生物必须在DC13的灵巧投掷中成功，否则只要它们还在网中，就会被限制住，直到它们挣脱。
任何进入粘性绳索区域的生物必须对爆炸进行救赎，就像他们在爆炸时处于该区域一样。
被网束缚的生物可以用它的行动对引爆的救赎DC进行力量检查。如果它成功了，它就不再被束缚。
分层在平面上的网有5英尺的深度。
与其说是几股粘稠的粘液，不如说是一些引爆的网络使该地区充满了大量快速硬化的泡沫，达到了同样的效果。
与网络法术不同，引爆网络不需要固定在固体块之间，也不容易燃烧。

item.name: Device Stabilizer
entries: 这个水晶结点必须附着在一个赛尔号上才能发挥作用。当你激活它时，它将自己与另一个赛尔号结合在一起，稳定它，所以当附加赛尔号被使用时，设备稳定器会阻止附加赛尔号被用光。当附加装置被激活时，你必须进行DC13智力（Arcana）检查。失败意味着设备稳定器脱离，另一个赛尔号被正常用完。掷骰子成功意味着设备稳定器被用完，所附的赛尔号可以再次使用。有些赛博（特别是药丸和注射剂）不能以这种方式稳定。

item.name: Devitilizer
entries: 这个奇怪的头盔、背带、手套和靴子由半透明的柔性管道连接。当你戴上所有部件并激活它作为你的行动时，这个遗物会在一分钟内抽干你身体里所有的液体，把你变成一个惰性的、皮革娃娃般的自己，大约1英尺高，只有几磅重。在这种形态下，你是无助的，处于停滞状态，并且可以无限期地保持这种状态。你的
娃娃形态对所有伤害都有抵抗力。如果你被浸泡在大约10加仑的水中，你的娃娃身体会在一分钟内吸收水，唤醒你并使你恢复正常。
毁灭者的损耗为1/100。

item.name: Diagnostic Graft
entries: 这种小的卵圆形装置有点大，不能被视为药丸。吞下后，它嵌入你的体腔，释放出微丝，连接到各个器官。cypher监测你的身体是否有疾病、寄生虫、毒药和污染物。当它探测到这些东西时，它会用光（通过你的皮肤可见）、声音或振动的模式来显示它们的存在，显示问题的位置和威胁的性质。你必须在DC9智力或智慧（医学）能力检查中成功，才能正确解读这些信号（如 "脑寄生虫"、"肺癌"、"血毒 "或 "胃真菌"）。警报每小时重复一次，除非你坚定地拍打它，而且每天重复，直到威胁结束。一旦移植物附着，效果就是永久性的，而且这个装置不再计入你能承受的细胞数量。

item.name: Dimensional Armor
entries: 这套完整的盔甲是由钢和一种坚硬的未知物质制成。它类似于板甲，但比任何已知的铁匠所能制造的都要轻得多，其非常精细的衔接点覆盖了整个身体，甚至在像脖子这样复杂的关节处。它能像板甲一样保护你（AC18），但有+2的奖励。当作为你的行动被激活时，在接下来的10分钟内，它将随机地转移你的相位，使你的对手在物理攻击的卷轴上处于劣势。特殊的多维武器和效果会忽略这种相位转移。
维度盔甲的消耗量为1/10，在你每次激活相位转移能力时检查。当盔甲耗尽时，相位转移不再起作用，但它仍然作为盔甲发挥作用。

item.name: Disrupting Nodule
entries: 这个水晶结点必须贴在你的武器上才能发挥作用；应用这个结点需要一个动作。受影响的武器会获得一个额外的能力，持续1天：每次带结晶体的武器击中固体生物时，会产生一阵纳米虫，直接攻击有机细胞。受影响的生物会受到1d4的坏死伤害，并且在DC13宪法救赎失败的情况下会失去能力一回合，或者在成功的情况下受到1d2坏死伤害。

item.name: Disruption Blade
entries: 这把剑、斧头或菜刀的刀身和刀柄上嵌有奇怪的装置。当作为你的行动被激活时，它在你的下一回合放射出一个破坏性的能量场。如果你在下一回合用该武器命中，该能量会造成额外的3d6坏死伤害。
一把破坏性的刀子有1/1D6的损耗。

item.name: Drill Spear
entries: 这种矛的矛身可能是由木头或一种未知的类似木头的物质制成。它的头部类似于一个螺旋状的金属钻头。如果你用它作为近战攻击，作为一个额外的动作，你可以激活长矛并放手，让它钻进你的对手，造成额外的2D6穿刺伤害。在你的对手的回合中，他们可以用行动、反应或额外行动来移除并放下长矛。
钻头矛的消耗量为1D20，每次激活时都要检查。

item.name: Drink Distiller
entries: 这种笨重的腰带由金属和玻璃管组成。它能从你的血液中过滤出酒精，将喝酒对你的影响时间减少一半。你喝的一半酒精被遗迹蒸馏到一个小的附属烧瓶中。由此产生的内容物具有与伏特加或威士忌等硬酒精相同的效力。
饮料蒸馏器的消耗量为1/1D20，每使用一个月检查一次。

item.name: Eagleseye
entries: 这颗蓝色大药丸能增强你的视力。在接下来的三个小时里，你在基于视觉的感知卷中具有优势。

item.name: Eclipse Projector
entries: 这个笨重的装置有一系列向上延伸的奇怪的尖刺。如果你在白天在室外启动它，它就会向太阳的方向投射出一簇颗粒。这些小球形成一个不透明的盾牌，在直径10英里的范围内阻挡阳光。在这个区域内，太阳看起来就像在经历一次全食。表面上的日蚀使你在欺骗、恐吓和说服方面具有优势，因为迷信的或原始的生物会被日蚀惊吓到。

item.name: Ecstasy Paralyzer
entries: 这个奇怪的手持设备在其外表面有几个明显的控制点。当作为你的行动被激活时，它发射出一道能量束，击中120英尺内的一个目标。在DC13智慧救赎失败的情况下，目标的头脑会被快乐所淹没，使其丧失能力一回合。该装置每回合可以发射多次，所以如果你有能力作为攻击动作攻击两次，你可以用狂喜麻痹器进行两次攻击。
狂喜麻痹器的消耗量为1D20，每次发射时都要检查（在同一回合内多次发射需要多次消耗量的滚动）。

item.name: Effort Enhancement
entries: 这种金属药丸充满了纳米机械，可以向一个未知但令人难以置信的智能无体实体发送和接收信号。当你使用这个药丸时，这个实体获得了对你思想的有限接触，当你执行一种任务时，它可以巧妙地刺激和鼓励你。在接下来的一天里，每当你为那种任务做卷子时，都要加上你的熟练度奖励。如果你通常会在那种任务上加上你的熟练度奖励，那么你会加上双倍的熟练度奖励。通常与此赛博相关的任务被限制在以下范围内。1-2 近战攻击 3-4 远程攻击 5-8 识别和使用纳物 9-10 抢救纳物 11-12 感知 13-14 劝说 15 医学 16 灵巧救治 17 智力救治 18 智慧救治 19 运动 20 隐身

item.name: Emotion Smoother
entries: 这个细胞器看起来像一块苍白的柔性合成物，一边是光滑的，另一边感觉像砂纸。当被激活时（将粗糙的一面贴在你的皮肤上，然后拍打光滑的一面），在接下来的一个小时里，它会阻断你头脑中产生情绪的部分。这使你能够体验到你可能无法处理的情况，公平地权衡各种选择而不走情感捷径，或说完全令人信服的谎言，因为你不再因情感不一致而产生微表情或其他告诉的反应。当贴片激活时，任何对你的魅力、恐惧或其他基于情绪的影响都会被抑制。你在欺骗术方面获得优势。当效果结束时，任何被压制的效果都会恢复（如果它的持续时间在赛博仍然有效时没有过期）。

item.name: Empath's Lenses
entries: 这是一个戴在脸上的类似面具的设备，眼睛的位置有厚厚的透明镜片。当作为你的行动被激活时，在接下来的一分钟里，该设备将图像投射到镜片上，识别面部微表情、身体语言线索。
你在10英尺内看到的任何人的举止和说话方法。这使你能更深入地了解其他人的想法和感受。你在对你通过镜片观察的人进行欺骗、恐吓和劝说的时候获得优势。
一套移情作用的镜片在1D20中的消耗量为1。

item.name: Empty Field Generator
entries: 这个复杂的天线阵列建立在一个12英尺高的三脚架之上，其底部附近有一个复杂的控制面。组装和设置这个装置需要两个回合。当作为你的行动被激活时，在接下来的一个小时里，所有的生物、结构和其他人工改变的景观在视觉上被抹去了500英尺的半径。从该区域外看，除了光秃秃的地面和无害的灌木丛的幻觉外，什么都看不见。在该区域内，生物可以正常地看到他们周围的东西，尽管所有的照明都下降了一个等级。
一个空场发生器的耗损率为1/20。

item.name: Empty Hand
entries: 这个黄色的金属手镯可以戴在手腕上。戴上后，你的手会突出到一个人造的超维空间中，边长约6英尺。对观察者来说，你似乎没有手，而是有一个手掌大小的微弱光球盘旋在袖口的末端。你可以使用这个领域来正常操纵你周围的物品，就像你有一只手一样（而不是有限的心灵感应）。此外，你可以将任何你能握在手中的东西转移到次元空间作为一个动作，或者产生你已经储存的东西作为一个动作。
空手有1/1D100的耗损，每天使用时检查。当它耗尽时，有可能会出现意外的裂痕。

item.name: Endless Coil
entries: 作为你的行动，可以从这个拳头大小的金属装置的口中拉出一条50英尺长的薄而特别坚固的绞合材料（AC19）。这条线从一个无法进入的人造次元空间中出现。每轮可以拉出额外的长度，每次50英尺，达到一个任意的长度。它可以被切断或拉回；无论哪种方式，无尽的线圈都会继续产生绳子，直到遗物耗尽。
无尽线圈的耗损率为1/100，每天使用时检查。当它耗尽时，有可能会出现意外的裂缝。

item.name: Endless Stomach
entries: 这个装置可以像牙科器具一样装在你的嘴里。你仍然可以正常地说话和吃饭，尽管这样做没有一点口齿不清的感觉需要几天的练习。当你愿意时，这个装置会打开一个人造的超维空间，边长约10英尺，让你可以作为一个动作 "吃 "下几乎任何你能放进嘴里的东西，并在将来需要时作为一个动作再次产生该物体。
无尽之胃的耗损率为1/100，每天使用时检查。当它耗尽时，有可能会出现意外的裂缝。

item.name: Energy Nullifier
entries: 这个水晶盘连接在一个12英尺高的三脚架上，控制盒在胸前的高度。组装和设置这个装置需要两个回合。当作为你的行动被激活时，它将发出一股无形的能量爆发，最远可达 2英里，影响一个250英尺半径的范围。如果它们的稀有度是普通或不普通的，那么赛弗、遗物、铁肉和其他使用能量的numenera装置会在大约一小时内失去动力，使它们暂时失去作用。
一个能量无效器的消耗量为1/6。

item.name: Evolution Bud
entries: 这种肉质豆荚类似于一块半球形的水果。当作为你的行动被激活时，它移植到你身上（通常在你的大脑和脊柱附近），并注入化学物质，使你在第二天的过程中产生一种新的突变。如果你后来繁殖，你的孩子在度过青春期后也会发展这种突变。每个进化芽提供一个特定的突变，通常是一个有益的突变。进化芽有一个自动耗尽的过程；它只能使用一次（一天后荚果枯萎并脱落）。

item.name: Exploding Arrow
entries: 这种细长的杆子一端有一个微小的金属装置，与箭或弩箭足够相似，可以与这些武器一起使用。当它击中一个生物或固体物体（如地面）时就会爆炸。所有在10英尺半径范围内的生物必须做一个DC13的灵巧救赎动作。蓄力失败时目标会受到2d6+2的穿刺伤害，蓄力成功时则会受到一半的伤害（如果箭射中生物，该生物也会受到箭本身的1d6穿刺伤害）。
爆炸箭有一个自动耗尽的过程；它只能使用一次。

item.name: Explorer's Gloves
entries: 这些厚而灵活的手指手套在手掌一侧感觉就像最厚的天鹅绒。当作为你的行动被激活时，在接下来的一个小时里，手掌上的微观适应性毛发可以让你攀爬任何坚固的表面，甚至是极其困难或不可能的表面，如冰墙或力场。在攀爬过程中，任何其他使用一只或两只手的动作都需要你再次激活手套，否则它们就会失效，这样你就可以正常使用你的双手。
一双探险家的手套在1D20中的损耗为1。

item.name: Explorer's Lenses
entries: 这是一个戴在脸上的类似面具的装置，眼睛的位置有厚厚的透明镜片。当作为你的行动被激活时，在接下来的一个小时里，这个装置会将图像投射到镜片上，突出显示可能的小路、足迹和自然特征中的潜在缺口。你在与追踪和导航有关的检查中获得优势。
一套探险家的镜片在1D20中的消耗量为1。

item.name: Extradimensional Hand
entries: 这只由合成物和金属网组成的手套略微太长，手指也太多，但可以装在人的手上。当你激活它时，在接下来的30分钟里，你的手会变成泛维的，能够接触和影响超维和非相位的生物和物体，就像它们是完全实体或非实体的一样（以你喜欢的为准）。例如，如果你的手不在相位上，你可以在虚空界打一个生物，伸手穿过一堵实心墙，或者拿起一个超维的物体。这种泛维状态正好超出了你的肉体（包括你手上的衣服和盔甲，一个可以握在拳头里的小物体，等等）。

item.name: External Skeleton
entries: 这一系列的金属棒被连接在一起，形状近似于一个人的框架。当佩戴并作为你的行动激活时，在接下来的一小时内，这个遗物使你在所有力量卷和使用力量的近战攻击中获得优势，但使你在所有灵巧卷中处于不利地位。
外部骨架的损耗为1D20，每次激活时检查。

item.name: Extradimensional Viewer
entries: 这个轻巧的头盔由半透明的硬质材料制成，带有晶体镜片。当作为你的行动被激活时，在接下来的一个小时里，它将传输只有你能感知的图像和声音，向你展示附近维度的一切，直到大约

60 feet away. These images override what you might see in your current dimension, making you effectively blind to anything not in the viewed dimension (you can remove or put on the helmet as a bonus action).

The relic includes a limited machine intelligence that automatically adjusts to view the most appropriate nearby dimension when there are multiple options (such as showing an interesting demiplane or extradimensional space rather than an empty parallel dimension), but you can manually adjust it by succeeding at an Intelligence (Arcana) check.
An extradimensional viewer has a depletion of 1 in 1d20, checked each hour of use.

item.name: Eye-eating Loop
entries: This metallic staff has a hollow loop at the end whose inner edge bleeds darkness. Unless covered, it automatically reduces bright light within 10 feet to dim light. It has the following additional abilities.

entries.name: Chill
entries: If you use the staff to make a melee attack and hit, as your bonus action you can make the staff release a burst of energy, dealing an extra 2d6 cold damage.

entries.name: Darken
entries: As your action, you can increase the light-draining effect of the loop, causing all creatures within 120 feet to fall into complete darkness for about an hour.

entries.name: Ray
entries: As your action, you can use the staff to emit a blast of chill darkness from the loop with a range of 120 feet. Make a ranged attack roll for the ray. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 cold damage and must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be incapacitated for one round.
An eye-eating loop has a depletion of 1 in 1d20.

item.name: Eye Of Mental Contact
entries: This prosthesis replaces one of your eyes with a slightly oversized metallic version that you can see with normally. In addition, all creatures with minds you can sense within a 100 feet are limned (in your sight) with a glowing aura, allowing you to gauge a creature's relative strength of mind (weak, moderate, strong, godlike), and see its
silhouette in otherwise lightless conditions.

The eye has 4 charges and regains 1d4 expended charges daily at dawn. You can speak telepathically with others who are within 60 feet, by using 1 charge per contact. Communication is two-way, but the other party must be willing and able to communicate. You don't have to see the target of telepathy, but you must know that it's within range. You can have more than one active contact at once, but you must establish contact with each target individually as an action. Each contact lasts up to 10 minutes.

item.name: Eye Of Mental Supremacy
entries: This prosthesis replaces one of your eyes with a slightly oversized metallic version that you can see with normally. It has 20 charges and regains 2d10 expended charges daily at dawn. It has the same telepathic functions as the eye of mental contact, plus a couple more abilities.

You can read the surface thoughts of a creature within 60 feet of you that you can see (1 charge). The target must succeed at a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw to avoid the effect. Once you have established contact, you can read the target's thoughts for up to one minute.

In addition, you can blast waves of mental force into the minds of up to five targets within 60 feet (1 charge per target); each must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or take 8d6 psychic damage on a failure, or 4d6 psychic damage on a successful save.

Finally, you can attempt to take mental dominion over a humanoid within 60 feet of you that you can see or sense (1 charge). The target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom save or come under your control. This effect lasts for 1 minute, 10 minutes if 3 charges are used, or an hour if 5 charges are used. Additionally, you can attempt to target any creature you can see if you spend an additional 2 charges.
Once you have established control, you maintain mental contact with the target and sense what it senses. You can allow it to act freely or override its control on a case-bycase basis.

item.name: Eyepiece Of Understanding
entries: This narrow metal tube has about the same length and proportions as a spyglass. When activated as your action and used to look at an object or creature within 500 feet for one minute, images projected within the tube help you gain an understanding of the target's abilities and weaknesses. Add your proficiency bonus on ability checks to understand or identify the target you're viewing through the relic. If you normally would add your proficiency bonus for those checks, you instead add double your proficiency bonus.
An eyepiece of understanding has a depletion of 1 in 1d6.

item.name: Farspeaker
entries: This cubical device partially unfolds into an angular ovoid shape. After you activate it, you choose a location that you can see (up to about 2 miles away, weather permitting). Anything you say can be heard at that location as if you were actually there and speaking at the same volume. You can also hear sounds in that area if you were at that location and trying to listen, although only sounds within 60 feet of that location are clear.

item.name: Fearmaker
entries: This pole with a metal cone on top has several parts that bend outward to create a stable frame. It takes two rounds to assemble and set up this device. When activated as your action, the fearmaker affects the minds of all thinking creatures within a 120-foot cone. All creatures in the area must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw against fear or drop what they're holding and do one of the following:

rows: Cower (drop prone) and lose their action for {@dice d6} rounds
Fall unconscious for one minute (or until they take damage or someone spends an action to shake or slap them awake).

entries: A fearmaker has a depletion of 1 in {@dice 1d6}.

item.name: Fiery Hellmaker
entries: This vertical pole has a metal disc on top, a control box in the center, and several sturdy metal legs that bend outward to support it. It takes two rounds to assemble and set up this device. When activated as your action, the disc fires a barrage of burning metal in all directions. Each creature within range (except for a 3-foot-radius area at the base of the device) must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. Targets take 2d4 piercing damage and 2d4 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
A fiery hellmaker has a depletion of 1 in 1d6.

item.name: Filtration Straw
entries: This thin, foot-long tube is made of an unknown material that is lighter than wood. Any water that passes through it is made free of poison, disease, and most other contaminants (generally anything that deals less than 1d6 points of damage is rendered harmless). Most liquids other than water drawn through it (such as mud, potions, blood, wine, and milk) come out the other end as purified water (or mostly water).

item.name: Fireproofing Spray
entries: When you activate this synth and metal canister, it sprays aromatic droplets up to 10 feet. The spray dries within seconds, creating an invisible coating. Anything coated by the droplets gains fire resistance for 1 day. The spray can completely coat one Medium creature or about a 10-foot-by-10foot flat area (such as a wall).

item.name: Flame Cloak
entries: This disc implanted in your head has 4 charges and regains 1d4 expended charges daily at dawn. At your mental command, your entire body becomes shrouded in flames that last up to one hour (1 charge). The fire doesn't burn you, but it automatically deals 1d6 fire damage to anyone who tries to touch you or strike you with a melee attack. While the shroud is active, you gain a +1 bonus to AC and fire resistance.

item.name: Flame Gauntlet
entries: This prosthesis replaces one of your hands with a slightly oversized metallic version that you can use normally. It has 12 charges and regains 1d12 expended charges daily at dawn. It has the same shroud of flame function as flame cloak, plus the following ability.

While your shroud of flame is active, you can extend it to cover a weapon you wield for one hour as a bonus action. It ignites with a roar, exhaling a thick spiral of black smoke from its tip. The flame ends if you stop holding or carrying the weapon. While
in 1d6. the flame lasts, the weapon deals +2d8 fire damage.

item.name: Flame Halo
entries: This disc implanted in your head has 12 charges and regains 1d12 expended charges daily at dawn. It has the same shroud of flame function as flame cloak, plus a couple more abilities.

While your shroud of flame is active, you can reach into it and hurl a handful of fire at a target up to 60 feet away that you can see (1 charge). The target must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. It takes 8d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
Finally, while your shroud of flame is active, you can spread wings of fire, gaining a flying speed of 60 feet for 1 minute (2 charges).

item.name: Flame-retardant Wall
entries: This metal bracelet has several fine controls on it. When activated, it creates an immobile transparent wall of energy, 15 feet on a side, centered on you. This wall is similar to a force field except it only prevents fire from passing through it - any fire that inflicts 10 fire damage or less stops at the wall. A burning object such as a torch is extinguished if it passes through the wall. The energy wall lasts for 3 hours.

item.name: Flame Suppressor
entries: This forearm-sized collapsible metal tube expands to 3 feet wide and 6 feet long, and is wrapped in multiple smaller tubes of an unknown hard material. When activated as your action, it launches a spherical device into the air that hovers overhead for a moment and then seeks out open flames within 500 feet. Over the next hour, it draws moisture from the air and quenches any small fires it finds within the area. If deployed against a larger fire (such as a burning building or portion of a town), everyone in the area gains advantage on rolls to extinguish or block the fire.
A flame suppressor has a depletion of 1 in 1d6.

item.name: Flesh Disruptor
entries: This handheld device has a few simple controls. When activated as your action, it emits a beam of energy that strikes one target within 60 feet. On a failed DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, the target takes 5d8 necrotic damage. The beam only affects organic creatures and materials. The device can fire multiple times per round, so if you have the ability to attack twice as an attack action, you could make two attacks with the flesh disruptor.
A flesh disruptor has a depletion of 1 in 1d10, checked each time it is fired (firing multiple times in the same round requires multiple depletion rolls).

item.name: Flesh Ink Pen
entries: This device is a narrow pointed cylinder about six inches long that comfortably fits in your hand. When used like a pencil on a surface, it creates lines of thin living tissue, which can be built up like a lattice to create three-dimensional structures. The pen can create skin, nerves, cartilage, and vascular tissue. Using the pen gives you advantage on Medicine rolls and similar tasks where being able to create healthy flesh would be useful (such as crafting a homunculus).
A flesh ink pen has a depletion of 1 in 1d20, checked each hour of use.

item.name: Fleshy Head Disguise
entries: This adhesive patch of synth has a yellow side and a green side. To use it, you must first press the yellow side against a creature and activate it, which scans that creature. When you activate the green side, the cypher creates a lifelike fleshy model of that creature's head that can be worn as a full- head prosthetic mask.

The model has muscles, nerves, and blood vessels that react to your face and head movements, including speech, facial expressions, blushing, and blinking, but does so with the copied creature's appearance (including scars and retinal scans). The worn model gives you proficiency and advantage on checks to

disguise yourself as the copied creature, although if the wearer has a very different shape than the copied creature, it is unlikely that anyone will believe it. The model lasts for four hours, after which it melts into harmless goo.

item.name: Food Scanner
entries: This handheld device has several controls and a wide dish at one end. When activated as your action and pointed at food within 10 feet, it sounds an alarm if the food has any contaminants or poisonous substances.
A food scanner has a depletion of 1 in 1d20.

item.name: Food Tube
entries: This device is of similar size and shape to a scroll case. When activated as your action, it produces a gray paste that provides enough nutrition for one person for one day.

A food tube has a depletion of 1 in 1d10. When it depletes, there are equal chances that it completely ceases to function, spews out unpalatable sludge before ceasing to function, or creates one last batch of paste that seems normal but is actually poisonous (anyone who eats it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1d6 hours).

item.name: Force Cube Projector
entries: This glowing metal ring contains a powerful, short-lived force field generator. When activated, it creates a cube of solid force, 30 feet on a side and 1/4 inch thick, centered on you, lasting 1 hour. It conforms itself to the space available. If the cube cuts through a creature's space when it appears, the creature is pushed to one side of the cube (your choice which side). Nothing can physically pass through the cube. It is immune to all damage and can't be dispelled. A disintegrate spell destroys it instantly. The cube also extends into the Ethereal Plane, blocking ethereal travel through the cube.

item.name: Force Dome
entries: This pole with a glass globe on top has a control box in the center and several flexible legs that create a stable support for it. It takes two rounds to assemble and set up this device. When activated as your action, it creates a powerful spherical force field with a radius of 30 feet. If the dome passes through a creature's space when you create it, the creature is pushed to one side of the force field (your choice). Nothing can pass through the force field. It can't be dispelled, but can be disintegrated. The force field is essentially invulnerable. It lasts for one day, during which time the air inside is enough to support six people.
A force dome has a depletion of 1 in 1d20.

item.name: Force Nodule
entries: This synth nodule must be affixed to your armor (or a piece of clothing) to function; applying the nodule takes an action. For the next day, the armor is bolstered by a force field that subtly repels attacks against you. The force field grants you a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws.

item.name: Force Screen Projector
entries: When activated, this bulky metal and synth belt creates an immobile plane of force, 20 feet on a side and 1/4 inch thick, that lasts for 6 hours. It conforms itself to the space available. If the wall cuts through a creature's space when it appears, the creature is pushed to one side of the wall (your choice which side). Nothing can physically pass through the wall. It is immune to all damage and can't be dispelled. A disintegrate spell destroys it instantly. The wall also extends into the Ethereal Plane, blocking ethereal travel through the cube.

item.name: Friction-reducing Gel
entries: When you activate this synth and metal canister, it sprays pungent droplets up to 10 feet. The spray dries within seconds, creating an invisible coating on a 10-footby- 10-foot area (such as a patch of ground). For the next 3 hours, the area is difficult terrain. When the coating appears, each creature standing in its area must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. A creature that enters the area or ends its turn there must also succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. If the area is a wall or other upright surface, attempts to climb it have disadvantage.

item.name: Force Shield Projector
entries: This injector contains a golden fluid made up of nanites. When injected into your body, the nanites travel through your flesh and create a skin-tight energy shield around you for 1 hour, which grants you a +3 bonus to AC.

item.name: Frigid Wall Projector
entries: When activated, this synth and crystal device creates a wall of supercooled air, 30 feet on a side and 1 foot thick, that lasts for 10 minutes. When the wall first appears, each creature within its area must make a Dexterity saving throw. That creature takes 4d6 + 4 cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature moving through the sheet of frigid air for the first time on a turn must make a Constitution saving throw against the wall instead of a Dexterity save.

item.name: Gas Bomb
entries: This metal wristband sometimes emits smelly fumes from small pores on its surface. As your attack action, you can use it to launch a small capsule at an area

(range 30/120). The capsule explodes when it hits a creature or solid object (such as the ground), creating a poisonous cloud that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere. The cloud lingers for 1d6 rounds unless conditions dictate otherwise. All creatures within the cloud (and any creature that enters it for the first time on a turn) must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or suffer an effect. The effect of a failed saving throw on a target depends on what kind of poison it is:

rows: Harmless thick smoke: occludes sight while the cloud lasts but has no other effect.
Choking gas: choking and coughing incapacitates and suffocates for 6 rounds.
Poison gas: deals 2d6 + 2 poison damage (half damage on a successful save).
Corrosive gas: deals 2d6 + 2 acid damage (half damage on a successful save).
Hallucinogenic gas: hallucinations and visions incapacitate for 6 rounds.
Nerve gas: grants disadvantage on Dex rolls and saves for 6 rounds.
Mind-numbing gas: deals 2d6 + 2 psychic damage (half damage on a successful save).
Fear gas: frightened and flees in a random direction (or is paralyzed with fear) for 6 rounds.
Amnesia gas: permanently loses all memory of the last minute.
Sleep gas: falls asleep for 6 rounds (or until they take damage or are shaken or slapped awake).
Rage gas: uses its action to make a melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its reach for the next 6 rounds (if no creature is in reach, it instead does nothing on its turn).

item.name: Gauntlet Of Protection
entries: This prosthesis replaces one of your hands with a slightly oversized metallic version that allows you to use your hand normally. It has 4 charges and regains 1d4 expended charges daily at dawn. As a reaction (1 charge) you can take when attacked, the gauntlet manifests a small plane of pure translucent force that flickers and gleams, taking on a shield-like shape that hovers near you for 1 round, granting you a +2 bonus to AC and advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

item.name: Gauntlet Of Shield Brandishing
entries: This prosthesis replaces one of your hands with a slightly oversized metallic version that allows you to use your hand normally. The gauntlet has 10 charges and regains 1d10 expended charges daily at dawn. It has the same shield-generating function as the gauntlet of protection, plus the following additional abilities.
If you expend 3 charges as an action, the shield manifested lasts for 1 minute instead of 1 round.

If you expend 5 charges as an action, instead of creating a shield (or replacing your shield if already manifested), you create a shimmering force wall within 10 feet of you that lasts for up to one hour (or until you manifest a shield again). The immobile plane of solid force is up to 20 feet wide and tall, and 1/4 inch thick. The plane of the force wall conforms to the space available. If the wall cuts through a creature's space when it appears, the creature is pushed to one side of the wall (your choice which side).
Nothing can physically pass through the wall.

item.name: Glowbrand
entries: This adhesive patch gently sticks to metal, flesh, leather, and many other substances. As a bonus action you can tap it in a specific sequence to set it to bright light, dim light, or off. When set to bright light, it provides bright light within 120 feet for one hour. When set to dim light, it provides dim light within 60 feet, indefinitely.
A glowbrand has a depletion of 1 in 1d20, checked each time you set it to bright light.

item.name: Glue Emitter
entries: This fat synth ring is almost as long as your knuckle, has a small aperture on one side and a dial on the opposite side. You can activate it in one of two modes: slow or fast. In slow mode, the aperture produces a liquid glue that hardens after a preset time (anywhere from one round to one minute, depending on how you set the dial) into a hard, permanent synth bond. The hardened glue has a DC of 13. The glue won't stick to or bond with the cypher itself. The cypher can produce a line of glue that is 1 inch in diameter and about 50 feet long, enough to affix a 10-foot-square panel to a wall or seal shut a couple of human-sized doors. Ten minutes after you first activate the cypher, the remaining glue clogs it up and makes it unusable.
In burst mode, the cypher acts much like a {@item detonation of webs|aota} cypher, except the rapidly cured glue lasts only about 10 minutes before degrading.

item.name: Golden Aura Cloak
entries: This surplice-like garment is embedded with bulky devices. When activated as your action, it creates a calming golden radiance for about 10 hours. This glow provides dim light within 60 feet. Anyone within the glow has advantage on Persuasion, pleasant interactions, and Intelligence saving throws. Anyone who spends Hit Dice for healing while within the glow can reroll each Hit Die and take the better result.
A golden aura cloak has a depletion of 1 in 1d20.

item.name: Gravitevator
entries: This heavy backpack-like device is made of metal, glass, and unknown materials. As your action, you can unfold it into a 3-footsquare platform, which activates it for one hour. If you stand on the platform, you can use your bonus action to have it levitate you to whatever height you say, up to a maximum of 120 feet above the platform. If the platform is set up next to a structure, you can safely step from this levitated elevation onto the structure. If you step from a higher elevation into the space above the platform, it automatically catches you and levitates you down to the platform.
Because a gravitevator doesn't require attunement, after activation, anyone can use it to levitate up or down.
A gravitevator has a depletion of 1 in 1d20, checked each time it is activated.

item.name: Gravity Changer
entries: This pair of metallic plates is held together by a weak magnetic attraction, and weighs much less than would be expected. When you activate the cypher, the direction of gravity changes in the space between the plates (up to a sphere 60 feet across), as decided by you using settings on one of the plates. The warped gravity could be continuous across the affected area, or it could bend and curve, changing directions within the area up to five times. The strength of gravity in the area is always normal, but it might pull things sideways or at an angle instead of directly down. The warped gravity lasts for a day.

item.name: Gravity Nullifier
entries: This metal ring has an unusual buoyancy and inertia (like a gyroscope). When you activate it, you can levitate up or down 20 feet as part of your move. If you are not on the ground, you can only move horizontally by pushing or pulling against a fixed object within reach (such as a wall or ceiling), which allows you to move as if you were climbing. The effect lasts for one hour. A typical gravity nullifier has a weight limit of 300 pounds.
Gravity nullifiers are frequently called flight rings or belts, levitators, or invisible wings.

item.name: Gravity-nullifying Spray
entries: When you activate this synth and glass canister, it sprays elastic droplets up to 10 feet. The spray dries within seconds, creating an invisible coating. Any object coated by the droplets floats 1d20 feet in the air permanently and no longer has weight if carried, though it needs to be strapped down to prevent it from floating off with air currents. The spray can completely coat one Medium object or about a 10-foot-by-10-foot flat area (such as a wall).

item.name: Hardening Spray
entries: This bulky handheld device has a large tank and a rubbery hose with a wide aperture. When activated as your action, a fine mist of scintillating dust emanating from the device covers and adheres to walls or defensive structures of up to 30 feet wide by 30 feet tall per round; the cypher has about 10 rounds worth of charge, which means a total area of up to 300 feet by 300 feet could be so treated. For the next day, the walls and structures sprayed gain a +5 bonus to their object AC (to a maximum of 22).

item.name: Harmony Lamp
entries: The interior of this crystal orb intermittently glows even in its passive state. When activated, for the next hour it emits a combination of colored light, gentle sound, subtle odors, and healing nanobots that permeate a 30-foot-radius sphere, which together make everyone there more open- minded and relaxed. Creatures who've made up their minds about a topic may be open to revisiting the issue. Everyone gains advantage on Animal Handling and Persuasion rolls. Any characters spending Hit Dice to regain hit points in the area add their proficiency bonus to the amount they heal from resting.

item.name: Headroom Helmet
entries: This helmet is made of a hard, smooth, clear substance similar to crystal. When worn, your head and most of the helmet except for a metallic collar protrude into an artificial extradimensional space just large enough for comfort. The helmet allows you to see, hear, and communicate into the Material Plane almost normally, though with some distortion. To observers, it seems as if you have no head. While worn, you gain resistance to psychic damage, immunity to attacks that would blind you, as well as any other attacks that require your head to be targeted for the effect to be transferred.
A headroom helmet has a depletion of 1 in 1d100, checked per day of use. When it depletes, there is a chance of an accidental rift.

item.name: Healing Sword
entries: This sword-like blade has a strange hilt made of several exotic materials. As your bonus action, you can squeeze the hilt in a precise way, causing it to inject a healing substance into your body, restoring 1d8 + 1 hit points.
A healing sword has a depletion of 1 in 1d10, checked each time the healing ability is used. When the healing ability depletes, it still functions as a normal sword.

item.name: Health Resonator
entries: This bulky device requires two hands to use, partly because of its size and partly because the controls are inconveniently placed. When activated, all creatures within a 60-foot cube gain 5 temporary hit points. These last about an hour, unless they are depleted first.

item.name: Heat Nodule
entries: This deep orange crystal nodule must be affixed to a melee weapon to function; applying the nodule takes an action. The affected weapon then gains the following additional ability for 1 day. Each time the nodule-bearing weapon strikes a solid creature or object, it generates a burst of heat, dealing 1d6 fire damage.

item.name: Helm Of Illusion
entries: This smooth helm permanently covers your head, giving you a mirror-like expanse instead of a face. You can see, breathe, eat, hear, and speak normally; from your perspective, you still retain your normal features. However, all others see only their own faces reflected back; this situation confers disadvantage to your Persuasion attempts.

The helm has 4 charges and regains 1d4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend 1 charge, you can create a single image of a creature or object within 10 feet of you. The image must fit within a 10-foot cube. The image can move (for example, you could make the illusion of a person walk or attack), but it can't leave the area defined by the cube. The illusion includes sound but not smell. It lasts for 10 minutes, but if you want to change the original illusion significantly-such as making a creature appear to be wounded-you must concentrate on it again as your action. If you move more than 20 feet away from the area, the illusion vanishes. If directly interacted with, the illusion is revealed as a mere image.

item.name: Helm Of Metal Control
entries: This helm studded with strange devices is permanently attached to your head; however, an opening in the front and sides allows you to see, breathe, eat, hear, and speak normally.
The helm has 4 charges and regains 1d4 expended charges daily at dawn.

You can exert force on metal objects within 50 feet that you can see or sense for one round as your action (1 charge). You can use it to move metal objects, push against metal objects, and so on. Strength contests to resist your manipulation are DC

15. For example, in your round, you could lift and pull a light metal object anywhere within range to yourself or move a heavy object (like a piece of furniture) about 10 feet. This power lacks the fine control to wield a weapon or move objects with much speed, so in most situations, it's not a means of attack. You can't use this ability on your own body. The power lasts for one hour or until the iron flesh's charges are depleted on some other use, whichever comes first.

item.name: Helm Of Metal Mastery
entries: This helm studded with strange devices is permanently attached to your head; however, an opening in the front and sides allows you to see, breathe, eat, hear, and speak normally.

The helm has 20 charges and regains 1d20 expended charges daily at dawn. It has the same metal-moving function as the helm of metal control (except the DC for Strength contests is DC 17), plus a couple more abilities.

If 2 charges are expended as a reaction you can take when attacked, you gain advantage against one incoming attack that uses metal. If you spend 4 charges as a reaction you can take when attacked, all incoming, ranged, metallic projectile attacks (such as arrows, bullets, a thrown metal knife, and so on) are pulled to ground, giving you immunity to such attacks until your next turn begins.
Finally, if you expend 5 charges, you reshape a metallic item as you desire as

your action. The item must be within sight and within 60 feet of you, and its mass can be no greater than your own. You can affect multiple items at once as long as their combined mass falls within these limits, including fusing multiple items together. You can use this power to instantly tear, rip, or burst a Large or smaller nonmagical metal object; if the target is a Huge or larger metal object or, this function tears a 10-footcube portion of it (a magic metal item is unaffected by this function).
Alternatively, you can expend 5 charges to craft metal into another desired shape (crudely, unless you are proficient with tools related to the object you are trying to create) as your action.

You can then move the new object anywhere within range. For example, you could take a few metal shields, fuse them together, and use the resulting shape to block a doorway. You can use this ability to make an attack - causing a foe's armor to constrict, rendering a metal item into shards that you fling across the battlefield, and so on - against one target within short range. Regardless of the form of the attack, it is DC 17 to resist and a successful attack deals 8d8 damage (bludgeoning or slashing, depending).

item.name: Helm Of Phantasm
entries: This smooth helm permanently covers your head, giving you a mirror-like expanse instead of a face. You can see, breathe, eat, hear, and speak normally; from your perspective, you still retain your normal features. However, all others see only their own faces reflected back; this situation confers disadvantage to your Persuasion attempts.
The helm has 20 charges and regains 1d20 expended charges daily at dawn. It has the same illusion image function as the helm of illusion, plus a couple more abilities.

If 2 charges are expended, you can create an illusory guise to appear as someone or something else, roughly of your size and shape, for up to one hour. Once created, the disguise requires no concentration. For

each additional charge you spend, you can disguise one other willing creature within 10 feet. All disguised creatures must stay within sight of you or lose their disguise. A creature that becomes suspicious of the disguise can use its action to inspect your disguise and make an Intelligence (Investigation) check against DC 17. If it succeeds, it becomes aware of the disguise.

If you expend 4 charges, the helm creates images that would appear terrifying to creatures that you choose within a 120-footradius sphere centered on you. Those images appear within that area and menace the appropriate creatures. Each creature you want to affect must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom save, or flee in terror for 1 minute, pursued by its nightmares. Success means the creature ignores the images, which do not hamper it in any way.

Finally, you can make the illusion you create that fits within a 10-foot cube (as described in the helm of illusion) permanent if you expend 8 charges. Even if someone sees through the illusion or disperses it, the illusion returns again later, seeming as real as ever.

item.name: Hiding Alarm Nodule
entries: Relic, uncommon This starfish-like device is made of crystal and synth. When placed on a numenera structure (no larger than a 60-foot cube) and activated, the cypher protects the structure from attacks. For the next day, if the structure is hit hard enough to take damage, it goes out of phase for one hour. Everything inside the structure goes out of phase as well, although leaving the structure ends the departing occupant's phased state.

item.name: Hover Belt
entries: This odd-fitting metallic mesh belt has a metal box attachment with several dial controls. When activated as your action, the belt functions for 10 minutes. While the belt is active, as your move you can manipulate the dials to make yourself float 20 feet up or down, or up to 5 feet sideways.
A hover belt has a depletion of 1 in 1d20, checked each time you activate it.

item.name: Hover Square
entries: This thick piece of stiff material is approximately 1 foot square and unfolds into a square that is 8 feet by 8 feet, with subtle control buttons built flush into its top surface. When activated as your action, the unfolded square hovers slightly off the ground for one hour. The hovering platform can hold up to 5,000 pounds, and a person riding it can use their move to press the control buttons to move the platform up to 60 feet horizontally. The platform cannot otherwise fly - it moves like a ground vehicle.
A hover square has a depletion of 1 in 1d20, checked each time you activate it.

item.name: Hunter/Seeker
entries: This tube-like apparatus is worn over one shoulder like a satchel. As your attack action, you can use it to launch an intelligent missile at a target you specify. You must be able to see the target and it must be within 120 feet. The missile tracks the target, and if it misses, it continues to attack three more times until it hits or has used all four of its attempts. Different hunter/seekers have different effects:

entries.caption: Hunter/Seeker Effeect Table
rows: Target takes {@dice 2d6 + 2} piercing damage and must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or {@dice take 2d6 + 2} poison damage, or half damage on a successful save.

Explodes in a burst of flame. Targets within 10 feet must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity save (the target has disadvantage on this save). Targets take {@dice 2d6 + 2} fire damage on a failed save, or half damage on a successful one.
Target takes {@dice 2d6 + 2} lightning damage and must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be incapacitated for 3 rounds on a failed save, or no additional effect on a successful one.

Target must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw (the target has disadvantage on this save). The target is covered in an instantly-hardening sticky goo on a failed save (as {@item detonation of webs|aota} cypher), or not affected on a successful one.

item.name: Image Projector
entries: This heavy headband has a small device attached to its front end. As your action, you can activate it so it creates an immobile image for one hour. The image appears up to 60 feet away. Scenes include movement, sound, and smell, but not tactile effects. In effect, this is a nonmagical illusion with DC 13. The image is built into the device and what image appears is not under your control:

entries.caption: Image Project Effect Table
rows: Terrifying Large creature of an unknown species, perhaps one no longer alive in the world.
Beautiful pastoral scene filling a 50-foot cube
Food that looks delicious but may not be familiar to you, filling a 10-foot cube.
Solid color that obscures sight in a 50-foot cube.
Incomprehensible scene in a 20foot cube that is disorienting and strange.

item.name: Imager
entries: This rectangular handheld device has a clear panel of glass-like material. As a bonus action, you can use the imager to record the image (more accurate and realistic than a painting by a skilled artist) of anything viewed through the clear panel. The imager can store thousands of images, and you can use your action to make it display any image it has stored.
An imager has a depletion of 1 in 1d100. When it depletes, all images stored on it are lost.

item.name: Immobilizer
entries: This wand-like device has a group of open hexagonal tubes at one end. As your attack action, you can use the device to create a mass of rapidly expanding and hardening foam at one target (range 20/60). The target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw with disadvantage. On a failed saving throw, the target is restrained by rock-hard foam. A creature restrained by the foam can use an action once per minute to make a Strength check with disadvantage against the cypher's save DC 13. If it succeeds, it breaks free and is no longer restrained. After an hour, the foam crumbles into powder.

item.name: Inferno Wall Projector
entries: When activated, this synth and metal device creates a wall of extreme heat, 30 feet long and 1 foot thick, which lasts for 10 minutes. When the wall first appears, each creature within its area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw. That creature takes 4d6 + 4 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature moving through the wall for the first time on a turn must make a Constitution saving throw against the wall instead of a Dexterity save.

item.name: Infiltrator
entries: This saucer-sized device has a loosely-attached thumbnail-sized piece. When activated, the device adheres to your temple and launches the smaller piece in the direction you indicate. The small piece can fly, can see in all directions out to 150 feet, and identify basic layout, creatures, and major energy sources within its sight range. Its movement is blocked by any physical or energy barrier. Both parts of this cypher stop working when the smaller piece has moved a total of 1,500 feet.

item.name: Infrastructure Drill
entries: This device is a large sphere with a spiral of dense crystals extending from one end. When placed on or near a structure and activated, it drills into under the structure for the next hour, creating a series of tiny tunnels that weaken the structure and other structures within 100 feet. The affected structures gain vulnerability to all damage.

item.name: Instant Bridge
entries: This handheld device looks like a rod with a few controls on one end. You can use your action to make it shoot a cable up to 120 feet away. The end of the cable has a powerful magnet that automatically sticks to any metal surface it strikes. When you anchor the other end (by tying it in place or connecting the embedded magnet to another metal surface), the cable automatically goes taut and extends horizontal planks to create a narrow bridge about 3 feet wide. The bridge can support 1,000 pounds. You can use your action to disengage the magnets, withdraw the planks, and retract the cable into its portable rod form.
An instant bridge has a depletion of 1 in 1d20, checked each time you launch the cable.

item.name: Instant Item
entries: This angular amulet has a two-stage activation. The first time you activate it, it synchronizes with an object you are touching. The object must be something you can hold in one hand (up to about the size of a shield). The synchronized object then vanishes into a pocket of subspace, stored away safely. If you activate the amulet

item.name: Instant Servant
entries: This plate-sized device is made of synth and metal. When you activate it, it expands into a humanoid {@creature basic automaton, type one|aota|type one basic automaton} that is roughly 2 feet tall. It can understand your verbal commands (commanding it is not an action). It can attack or perform actions as you order to the best of its abilities, but it cannot speak. It never voluntarily goes more than 120 feet away from you. At the GM's discretion, the servant might have specialized knowledge, such as how to operate a particular device. Otherwise, it has no special knowledge. In any case, the servant is not artificially intelligent or capable of initiating action. It does only as commanded. The servant operates for 3 hours.

item.name: Instant Shelter
entries: This handheld device has multiple apertures and coiled tubes. When you activate it in the presence of air and at least one gallon of water (it can draw water vapor from the air on a humid day outside), it rapidly builds a simple one-room structure with a door and a transparent window. The structure is 10 feet by 10 feet by 20 feet and is made from stone. It is permanent and immobile once created.

item.name: Instant Wall
entries: This handheld device has multiple apertures and coiled tubes. When you activate it in the presence of air and at least one gallon of water (it can draw water vapor from the air on a humid day outside), it rapidly builds a simple wall up to 10 feet tall, 30 feet long, and 2 feet thick. The wall is made from stone. It is permanent and immobile once created.

item.name: Instant Workshop
entries: This small device expands into a sturdy workbench that fixes itself in place. The workbench provides an adjustable-height work surface with a light and a variety of attached tools suitable for working with numenera and crafting mundane objects (effectively these are carpenter's tools, cobbler's tools, leatherworker's tools, mason's tools, smith's tools, tinker's tools, and woodcarver's tools). The workbench and all its components are made of steel, and the workbench is permanent and immobile once created.

item.name: Intellect Boost
entries: When you place this adhesive patch on your skin as an action, you gain advantage on Intelligence ability checks for 1 hour.

item.name: Intellect Enhancement Patch
entries: This adhesive patch is saturated with a slimy goo and threaded with fine silver wires. When you activate it by placing it on your head and slapping it, it increases the efficiency of your brain. You gain advantage on all Intelligence ability checks and saving throws for 1 hour.

item.name: Iron Tamer
entries: This bulky device has many dials, screens, and sensors, and must be set on the ground to be used. When you activate it, it creates an immobile 60-foot-radius sphere that suppresses the activity of dangerous nanobots, such as a detonation of matter disruption. Within the sphere, these nanobots are immediately negated and destroyed, producing no harmful effect. The suppressing sphere lasts for 10 hours - which, hopefully, is long enough to ride out an entire storm of iron wind.

item.name: Kaon Preserver
entries: This crystal handheld device is filled with tiny glowing blue vortices of concentrated force. If activated as your action, a target within 5 feet of you must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or become locked in temporal stasis for an amount of time you specify when you activate it, with no apparent maximum value. Another kaon preserver can prematurely break this stasis. (Temporal stasis is a state in which the flow of time stops for the subject, but not for everyone else around subject.) Attacks against a subject in stasis are ineffective unless they are transdimensional in nature.

item.name: Kinetic Shield
entries: This object is composed of a band that can be worn around the wrist with a metallic- crystal device attached. When this device is activated as a reaction when a physical projectile such as an arrow, thrown knife, or bullet-like missile comes within 4 inches of the wearer's body, a powerful energy field activates automatically and attempts to slow or deflect the projectile. You have a +1 bonus to AC and advantage on Dexterity saves against such attacks.
A kinetic shield has a depletion of 1 in 1d10.

item.name: Knowledge Enhancement
entries: When you place this silvery adhesive patch on your skin as an action, you can apply double your proficiency bonus to any check related to finding, salvaging, identifying, understanding, or using devices of the numenera for 1 hour.

item.name: Lacewing Shirt
entries: This shirt-like garment is covered in overlapping scales made of an unknown flexible cloth-like substance. When activated as your action, the scales expand into hundreds of lacy bright green wings, granting you a fly speed of 120 feet for the next 5 minutes. You steer by adjusting the angle of your arms, and cannot use your arms for anything else while flying or you will fall.
A lacewing shirt has a depletion of 1 in 1d20.

item.name: Launcher
entries: This metal tube, wrapped in winding smaller tubes of strange material, projects anything placed in it no larger than the size of a fist with great force. When activated as your action, it launches the object up to 1,000 feet away. If used as an attack with an inert object like a rock, one target you can see within 500 feet must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 5d8 bludgeoning damage. If something more potent were projected, such as a {@item detonation of flesh-rotting|aota}, the target would be subject to the same attack and damage, plus save against the effect of the detonation.
A launcher has a depletion of 1 in 1d20.

item.name: Leadership Bud
entries: This small sphere of flesh is infused with metallic threads. It must be affixed to a living creature in order to function; applying the bud takes an action. Once applied, it temporarily grafts to you, unleashing microfilaments that enter your brain. For the next day, the bud whispers helpful advice that grants advantage to all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma ability checks. The bud dries up and falls off after it has provided its benefit, leaving only a tiny blemish.
A leadership bud has an automatic depletion; it can be used only once.

item.name: Lightning Wall Projector
entries: When you trigger this fist-sized complex machine by fixing it to the ground as your action, you create a wall of lighting up to 30 feet by 30 feet by 1 foot within 30 feet of the device. When the wall appears, each creature within its area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 5d8 lightning damage, or half that if successful. Creatures that attempt to pass through the wall face the same effect; in addition, those that fail their saving throw are thrown back and cannot pass that round.

item.name: Light Spike
entries: When this fingerless glove of semirigid smooth substance is activated as a bonus action, a spike of solid, red-hot energy is emitted from the back of your hand, fixed and hovering, which lasts for 10 minutes. If you are proficient with unarmed attacks, you are proficient with the activated light spike. You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon, which deals fire damage instead of slashing damage. When you hit with it, that target takes an extra 1d8 fire damage.
A light spike has a depletion of 1 in 1d10.

item.name: Liquid Armor
entries: This silk-like belt with two metallic cylinders attached to it is heavier than it looks. When activated as a bonus action, a liquid sprays out of the cylinders on the belt. A humming field shapes this strange fluid, causing it to form a protective shell around you, not unlike plate armor, which lasts for four hours (or until deactivated). The fluid becomes immediately - but selectively - rigid when struck, providing a +1 bonus to AC. Liquid armor has a depletion of 1 in 1d20.

item.name: Liquid Sword
entries: This silk-like wristband with a metallic cylinder attached to it is heavier than it appears. When activated as a bonus action, a liquid sprays out of the cylinders on the belt. A humming field shapes this strange fluid, causing it to form a sword-like shape. The fluid becomes immediately rigid and incredibly sharp, and can be wielded as a weapon (any sword) for up to four hours, or until deactivated. When you attack with the liquid sword and hit, maximize your weapon damage dice against the target.
A liquid sword has a depletion of 1 in 1d20.

item.name: Liquid Transfer Orb
entries: This head-sized amber orb is inscribed with countless tiny metallic lines. Using the relic requires a few rounds. First, the orb is broken into two halves. One half must be submerged in a liquid medium of any kind. Then, at any later date, the other half can be activated as your action. For the next day (or until deactivated), liquid from the submerged half of the relic pours out of the other half, teleported across any distance (including planar separations). Up to 150,000 gallons can be transferred during a one-day activation period.
A liquid transfer orb has a depletion of 1 in 1d100.

item.name: Living Armor Sheath
entries: When not affixed to a creature, a living armor sheath looks like a mass of heavy fabric. When being used, it looks like heavy, leathery flesh. Wriggling into the living armor sheath takes a couple rounds. It is worn directly on your skin (and under clothes and other armor; however, the skin bulks you up, requiring some wardrobe changes if your clothing was already tight). The living material adheres and conforms to your body shape. Once in place, you have advantage on saves to resist poison and disease and gain a +1 bonus to AC.
A living armor sheath has a depletion of 1 in 1d20, checked each day of use.

item.name: Living Conceptualization Sheath
entries: This looks like a mass of heavy fabric. When worn, it adheres and conforms to your body shape so it looks like heavy, leathery flesh. You gain advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws. Because the sheath is so bulky, you cannot wear armor over it. You can remove it as your action (which does not harm or deplete it).
A living conceptualization sheath has a depletion of 1 in 1d100, checked each day of use.

item.name: Lore Siphon
entries: When you activate this metal and synth amulet, it connects you with an unknown intelligence (perhaps a creature, perhaps a machine, or something even stranger). The connection remains open for about 1 minute, during which time you can ask one question. The GM answers each question with one word, such as "yes", "no", "maybe", "never", "irrelevant", or "unclear" (if the entity doesn't know the answer to the question). If a one-word answer would be misleading, the GM might instead offer a short phrase as an answer.

item.name: Machine Control Implant
entries: This metal disc adheres to your forehead. When activated as an action, the cypher splits into two pieces. One remains adhered to your forehead; the other can be affixed to a numenera device that you can reach. You can then use your mind to control the device up to 120 feet away that you can sense or see for up to one hour, bidding it to do anything it could do normally. Thus, a device could be activated or deactivated, or a machine capable of movement (like a vehicle) could be guided. If the control half is affixed to a machine that is also a creature, it can attempt a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw each round to ignore your command.

item.name: Machine Steed
entries: This device looks like a large metal barrel weighing 100 pounds, made of multiple sections held together by a hard, flexible material. When activated as your action, it unfolds legs, struts, and other odd devices until it vaguely resembles a quadruped creature such as a horse with a built-in saddle. It serves you as a fearless steed. It has the game stats of a riding horse, except it has AC 15 and the construct type. You gain advantage on all riding rolls for controlling the mount. You can use your action to return it to its barrel form.
A machine steed has a depletion of 1 in 1d100, checked each day of use.

item.name: Machine Stimulator
entries: This 15-foot-tall collapsible metal tripod has a large, directional crystal dish-like projection at the top. It takes two actions to assemble and set up this device, and then it requires your action to activate. When activated, this device produces an invisible signal that fills a 2-mile sphere centered on the tripod, so long as the tripod has direct line of sight. Within the affected area, numenera devices - including automatons and some creatures that are part machine (including PCs with iron flesh)'gain advantage (when applicable) on all checks, attacks, and defenses for one hour. In addition, any time a cypher would burn out after being used, treat it instead like a relic with a depletion of 1 in 1d4 while the stimulation signal lasts.
A machine stimulator has a depletion of 1 in 1d6.

item.name: Magnetic Attack Drill
entries: This fist-sized sphere has a thick screw protrusion. When thrown at a target within 60 feet as your action, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or the cypher begins drilling into the target, dealing 6d6 piercing damage. The drill remains stuck in the target and continues to drill down until it is dislodged. At the start of each of its turns until the drill stops, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 1d6 piercing damage. On a successful save, the drill is dislodged, at which point the cypher becomes inert. If the target is wearing metal, is made of metal, or is sporting one or more pieces of iron flesh, their saves against the drill have disadvantage.

item.name: Magnetic Master
entries: This small, pyramid-shaped metallic device can be used as an action to establish a connection with one metal object within 60 feet that a human could hold in one hand for one hour. After this connection is established, you can move or manipulate the linked object anywhere within 60 feet
(each movement or manipulation is an action). For example, you could wield a weapon or drag a helm affixed to a foe's head to and fro (giving them disadvantage on their actions).

item.name: Magnetic Shield
entries: This small, pyramid-shaped device can be activated as an action. For one hour, metal objects cannot come within a 10-foot-radius sphere of the activated device. Metal items already in the area when the device is activated are slowly pushed out at a rate of 5 feet per round. Strength contests to resist this push are versus DC 13, which increases by +1 per round the force is successfully resisted, up to a maximum of DC 25.

item.name: Mask Of Machine Command
entries: This implanted mask permanently attaches just like a mask of machine speaking, and conveys the function of a mask of machine speaking. In addition, it has 5 charges. It regains 1d4 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn.

You can expend 2 charges as an action to attempt to take command of a machine within 60 feet that you can see or sense. It must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or obey your will for one hour. (Advantage applies to its saving throw if you or your allies are already embroiled in a conflict with it.) If you expend all 5 charges instead of 2 charges, you can either increase the DC to 19 or increase the duration to 8 hours.

While charmed, you enjoy a machine channel of communication with the target that extends across all locations.
